page.title: 16Craigie's Industrial Estate.
page.content: On Glenearn Road near our school there is a{small industrial estate with a{wide variety}of businesses. 'Heron Rossleigh' sells and services Austin Rover{cars,}'General George' is a{carpet retailer.}Next comes 'Texas Homecare', a large{do-it-yourself store. Then there is Tay Valley{Meats. {British Telecom}have a depot, then Edwards{Engineering}Works who make and repair parts for light industrial machinery. Perenco (Perth{Engineering Company) make amongst other things parts for{petrol pumps.}Chemical {Spraying}Company, subsidiary of Shell Chemicals, provides a comprehensive {crop spraying}programme for{farmers and gives financial and technical {advice}on farm management. Tayside Regional{Council Roads Dept.}has a depot with snow ploughs ready to deal with wintry weather.
